Title: Object: Papyrus Anastasi 5
Description: Papyrus Anastasi V; sheet 4; Hieratic text. Late Egyptian Miscellanies. 10.1-10.2 Prayer to Thoth for skill in writing. 10.3-11.1 Be a scribe for the soldier's lot is hard. 11.2-11.6 Reprimand for failure to execute an order. 11.7 Congratulations to a military officer upon promotion. Unpublished small fragments apparently from this manuscript are now EA 76453.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: Gardiner Late Egyptian Miscellanies p. 60, 61, 62; Caminos Late Egyptian Miscellanies.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (381201) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/381201)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: insect attack Black ink Backed: brown paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Sandwich: board Binding: leather (deteriorated) Object Priority: B Mount Priority: B Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: fair
